item.title: Embedded Comments with cactus
item.description: If you’re interested in adding a comment section to your own website, take a look at the cactus chat website. I followed their quick start guide to write myself a hugo shortcode which looks like this: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://latest.cactus.chat/style.css" type="text/css"> <script type="text/javascript" src="https://latest.cactus.chat/cactus.js"></script> <br> <hr> </hr> <h3>Comments <i class="fa fa-comments fa-2x" aria-hidden="true"></i> </h3> <div id="comment-section"></div> <script> initComments({ node: document.getElementById("comment-section"), defaultHomeserverUrl: "https://matrix.cactus.chat:8448", serverName: "cactus.chat", siteName: "MaxBlog", commentSectionId: "{{ index .Params 0}}" }) </script> It is named chat.
